posts.content: Ordered 4 x BRM centre caps about a month ago. They said not in stock, have to order from USA. Fair enough I said. Paid the price and waited. They turned up today and they have sent me 4 x flat ones. I'm running a split!! I need 2 x deep ones to cover rear hubs! They now this as I have bought from them numerous times. Now I have to send them back at my cost and wait another bloody month!!! Aaaarrrggghhh!

It depends on what suspension you're running, as flats do fit on some buses.


Did you get what you ordered, or did they send the wrong one?

Hi Jim. We spoke at length about what I needed as diameters of caps is dependant on where you bought the wheels. Told them I ran stock hubs with reduction boxes. Ringing them in morning. I'm sure it will be sorted out but it's a bit frustrating. Too many companies are like this these days.
